message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair and will save us both from the impact of inflation.
Considering the inflation, I believe this is a more balanced offer. You lose more value each round, so let's settle on this.
Bob, it's clear inflation hurts me more than you. I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. This offer reflects that.
I understand your concerns about inflation, but I also need to consider my own losses. This offer is slightly more generous than before, but I'm not willing to go much further.

Bob, this is a tough negotiation!  I'm willing to be somewhat flexible, but I need you to meet me closer to the middle. This offer acknowledges your position but still gives me some protection from the shrinking pot.
